__e: "Okay, I'll go just this far and no farther," he draws another line just an inch farther and you say,
Then when you wouldn't step across the line I figured maybe the way to you is through your head.
For us, it may as well say, "Stop, don't come no further."
Then when you wouldn't step across the line I figured maybe the way to you is through your head.
We get the cops down here and they can figure out who's dead, who's alive and who's whatever.
Now, one of you doesn't belong here, and I'm guessing it's you.
Happened to me when I first came here.
I'm sorry. You came all the way out here and I should've waited a day to give you an answer.
Street corner, two in the morning, getting a taxi home...
